nodes.text: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor
Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi piloted a Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor during the Clone Wars, periodically flying with R4-P17 as his astromech droid co-pilot.
It was extensively damaged by Confederacy fire during the Battle of Sullust, the Jedi and droid barely escaping unscathed only with R2-D2's deployment of his built-in fire extinguisher in 20 BBY.
